mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client(clientCompanyName, clientName, clientTel, clientCity, requirement, createTime, updateTime) VALUES (#{clientCompanyName}, #{clientName}, #{clientTel}, #{clientCity}, #{requirement}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM client WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY createTime DESC limit #{index},#{pageSize};
